attributes.action: Assert a covid-coalition unity govt immediately to save lives
attributes.additional_details: Because we're on track to be the biggest epicentre of covid deaths in Europe due to bad/negligent decision making and misinformation and it cannot continue - there are still many measures that need taking ASAP including several mentioned in other petitions such as closing borders to unchecked incoming flights and a stricter lockdown , and ensuring the right protection for the NHS
attributes.background: Urgently take effective control of the covid crisis by using cross-party expertise, and immediately asserting a coalition, leaving politics aside to save the nation; the actions to date have failed with UK on track to be the biggest epicentre of deaths, and with huge risks to the NHS + economy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301563

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
